name: France
visaRequirements: Schengen Visa required for most non-EU citizens

about.description: France is renowned for its rich history, world-class art, iconic landmarks, and exquisite cuisine. From the romantic streets of Paris to the sun-soaked beaches of the French Riviera, France offers something for every traveler.
highlights: Home to the Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum
Famous for wine, cheese, and pastries
Diverse landscapes: Alps, lavender fields, and Mediterranean coast

attractions.name: Eiffel Tower
attractions.description: The iconic symbol of France, offering panoramic views of Paris.

attractions.name: Lavender Fields
attractions.description: Endless purple fields in bloom during summer, a photographer's dream.

attractions.name: Calanques National Park
attractions.description: Stunning limestone cliffs and turquoise coves along the Mediterranean coast.

cuisine.name: Croissant
cuisine.description: Flaky, buttery pastry enjoyed for breakfast across France.

cuisine.name: Ratatouille
cuisine.description: A traditional Provençal stewed vegetable dish.

cuisine.name: Bouillabaisse
cuisine.description: A flavorful fish stew from Marseille.

culturalNotes: Greet with 'Bonjour' and a handshake or cheek kiss
Shops may close for lunch, especially in smaller towns
Tipping is customary but not obligatory

articles.title: 4 Day Itinerary Across Southern France
articles.description: A sample itinerary for exploring the highlights of southern France in 4 days.
